function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to consider the complete pathway between built and natural environment, chronic disease, and covid-19 mortality rates may lead to incomplete understanding of disease transmission dynamics.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limiting nosocomial spread of infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growth of construction sector in boston","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of false information","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dominance of million-dollar cities in areas with attractive natural surroundings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited interest and involvement of politicians, military leaders, and government officials in wbe development","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Active infection of the digestive system by sars-cov-2, leading to gastrointestinal symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases in high-density areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative effect of traffic noise on green spaces and bird communities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive assessment of building domains for disease transmission risks","category":"Infrastructure
